text: Igor Zutic (born July 15, 1967)https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:2SMC-ZNZ is a Croatian- American physicist, focusing in spintronics and spin-polarized transport, high temperature and unconventional superconductivity, ferromagnetic semiconductors, theoretical nanoscience and computational physics at University of Buffalo and an Elected Fellow of the American Physical Society. ==References== ==Further reading== * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:University at Buffalo faculty Category:21st-century American physicists Category:Croatian physicists Category:University of Minnesota alumni Category:Fellows of the American Physical Society
title: Igor Zutic
